headline: LTLs hold pricing line; Old Dominion announces 4.9% GRI
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line is the latest less-than-truckload carrier to implement a general rate increase ahead of schedule. The post LTLs hold pricing line; Old Dominion announces 4.9% GRI appeared first on FreightWaves.

raw.headline: LTLs hold pricing line; Old Dominion announces 4.9% GRI
raw.summary: Old Dominion Freight Line is the latest less-than-truckload carrier to implement a general rate increase ahead of schedule. The post LTLs hold pricing line; Old Dominion announces 4.9% GRI appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. Announces General Rate Increase
summary: THOMASVILLE, N.C., October 20, 2025--Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (Nasdaq: ODFL) today announced a general rate increase (GRI) of 4.9 percent applicable to rates established under the existing ODFL 559, 670, and 550 tariffs effective November 3, 2025.
